content: mm hook and black yarn create a magic_ring 5sc into circle slip_stitch into first st fo leave tail for sewing sew onto side of head front legs- 4 25 mm hook green make 2 you will be working in rounds page 5 r1 chain 7 single_crochet into the 2nd chain from hook and next 4 sts 3 single_crochet into last st working on the other side of chain 1 single_crochet in next 4 2 single_crochet in last st 14 single_crochet put stitch marker in last st move every round r2 2 single_crochet into 1st 1 single_crochet in next 4 sts 2 single_crochet in next 3 sts 1 single_crochet in next 4 sts 2 single_crochet in next 2 sts 20 single_crochet r3 1 single_crochet into 1st st 2 single_crochet in next 1 single_crochet in next 4 sts *1 single_crochet in next 2sc in next* repeat ** 2 times 1 single_crochet 4 times repeat ** 2 more times 26 single_crochet r4-r5 single_crochet around 26 single_crochet r6 pinch together foot slip_stitch 5 sts together chain 1 single_crochet around the rest of the sts 16 single_crochet r7 single_crochet 6 decrease single_crochet 6 decrease 14 single_crochet r8 single_crochet around 14 single_crochet r9 2sc 1 single_crochet 6 times 2sc 1 single_crochet 6 times 16 single_crochet r10 2sc 1 single_crochet 7 times 2sc 1 single_crochet 7 times 18 single_crochet r11 2sc 1 single_crochet 8 times 2sc 1 single_crochet 8 times 20 single_crochet r12 2sc 1 single_crochet 9 times 2sc 1 single_crochet 9 times 22 single_crochet r13 2sc 1 single_crochet 10 times 2sc 1 single_crochet 10 times 24 single_crochet r14 2sc 1 single_crochet 11 times 2sc 1 single_crochet 11 times 26 single_crochet r15 2sc 1 single_crochet 12 times 2sc 1 single_crochet 12 times 28 single_crochet r16 single_crochet around 28 single_crochet stuff foot firmly pinch top of foot closed fo and leave long tail and sew the top closed sew in all ends page 6 back legs- 3 75 mm hook green make 2 you will be working in rounds you can use the picture for front legs for the back legs r1 chain 7 single_crochet into the 2nd chain from hook and next 4 sts 3 single_crochet into last st working on the other side of chain 1 single_crochet in next 4 2 single_crochet in last st 14 single_crochet put stitch marker in last st move every round r2 2 single_crochet into 1st 1 single_crochet in next 4 sts 2sc in next 3 sts 1sc in next 4 sts 2sc in next 2 sts 20 single_crochet r3 1sc into 1st st 2sc in next 1sc in next 4 sts *1sc in next 2sc in next* repeat ** 2 times 1 single_crochet 4 times repeat ** 2 more times 26 single_crochet r4-r5 single_crochet around 26 single_crochet r6 pinch together foot slip_stitch using same st as stitch marker 5 sts together ch1 single_crochet around the rest of the sts 16 single_crochet r7 sc6 decrease single_crochet 6 decrease 14 single_crochet r8 single_crochet around 14 single_crochet r9 2sc 1 single_crochet 6 times
